trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an attempt to connect to the local SharePoint site fails.
trans-unit.target: 尝试连接到本地 SharePoint 站点失败时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: This exception is usually raised by one of the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 通常由下列情况之一，引发此异常：

trans-unit.source: or [!INCLUDE[wss_14_long](~/includes/wss-14-long-md.md)] is not installed on the computer.
The local instance of [!INCLUDE[moss_14_long](~/includes/moss-14-long-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[wss_14_long](~/includes/wss-14-long-md.md)] is not running.
The current user does not have the appropriate permissions in SharePoint.
trans-unit.target: 在 SharePoint 中情况下，当前用户没有适当的权限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Requirements for Developing SharePoint Solutions](/visualstudio/sharepoint/requirements-for-developing-sharepoint-solutions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[有关开发 SharePoint 解决方案的要求](/visualstudio/sharepoint/requirements-for-developing-sharepoint-solutions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio is not run with administrator privileges, or the current user is not an administrator on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 不使用管理员特权运行 visual Studio 或当前用户不是本地系统上的管理员。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 3.5 SP1 is not installed on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 在计算机上未安装.NET Framework 3.5 SP1。

trans-unit.source: The site URL of the project is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 项目的站点 URL 无效。

trans-unit.source: An internal communication error has occurred.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointConnectionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointConnectionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointConnectionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointConnectionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />，它包含关于源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointConnectionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointConnectionException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointConnectionException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.SharePointConnectionException" /> 类的新实例。
